message:
fix: DEV-117: DEV-1179: DateTime tag, fixes for date save and region switch (#713)

* DateTime tag

* Show only parts specified in `only` param

* Fix visual appearance of Number and DateTime tags

* Use min/max params in DateTime tag

* Always use value in DateTime inputs

This fixes perRegion and browser warnings

* Fix deserialization for time values

* Fix docs for Number and DateTime a bit

* Add format param to DateTime

* Add month and year selectors to DateTime

* Add year selection; change internal format

Now day, month and year stored separately

* Update docs for DateTime a little

* Update DateTime.js

Standardize text

* Update DateTime.js

Revise explanation of defaults for format

* [fix] add margin for DateTime

* save rolling input value without transformations, block 3 value years from state submission

* enable loading state information into date and solo year components

* year persists

* feat: dev-2425: feature flag registry of datetime flag

* date change on region click and date not saved fixes

* reset to prev state on blur if date was invalid and not saved, fix spelling and wrire more readable variables

* Add example with DateTime

* feat: DEV-117: Add missed feature flag for DateTime

* add test for dateTime

* remove feature flag

Co-authored-by: hlomzik <hlomzik@gmail.com>
Co-authored-by: smoreface <smoreface@users.noreply.github.com>
Co-authored-by: Travis Clark <“travisjosephclark@gmail.com”>
